title: Sweet and Spicy Balti Chicken
ingredients: ['3 tablespoons Greek yoghurt', '2 tablespoons tomato puree', '2 tablespoons mango chutney', '1 clove garlic, crushed', '2 teaspoons garam masala', '1 teaspoon chilli powder', '1 teaspoon sugar', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '3 skinless chicken breast fillets, diced', '100ml water', '1 de-seeded green chilies, thinly sliced (optional)', '2 tablespoons single cream', '2 tablespoons finely chopped fresh coriander']
